text: Are xoꞌpan pa ri tinimit Jerusalén, ri Jesús xok bꞌik pa ri Templo, xuchapleꞌj kesaxik loq ri winaq ri aꞌjkꞌayibꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri tajin keloqꞌoꞌmanik. Xuwolqotij bꞌik ri kimexa ri tajin kakikꞌex pwaq xuqujeꞌ ri kikꞌolibꞌal ri aꞌjkꞌayibꞌ taq palomax.11:15 Ri aꞌwaj ri kekꞌayix pa ri Templo are waꞌ ri keporox cho ri Dios. Ri pwaq ri kakꞌex pa ri Templo are waꞌ ri pwaq ri xwi pa ri Templo kariqitaj wi. E kꞌi man xtzꞌaqatisax ri kirajil rumal man sukꞌ ta kenoꞌjin ri e kꞌexol taq re.
